---
name: create-plan
description: Create docs/plan.md from docs/spec.md (milestones + tasks with DoD + validation).
agent: 'agent'
---

## Task

Create or update `docs/plan.md` based on `docs/spec.md` using the template:

- `docs/templates/plan.template.md`

## Requirements

- Break work into **6–10 issues**, each sized 0.5–2 hours.
- Every task must include:
  - Problem statement
  - Definition of Done (checkboxes)
  - Validation command(s)
- Identify dependencies between tasks.
- Keep the plan workshop-sized (avoid overengineering).

## Output

- Edit `docs/plan.md` only.
- Do not implement code yet.
